context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 24 tested: (1) Light mode colors updated per new design system - WORKING (primary=#628141, bg=#FFFFFF, surface=#EFF3ED), (2) Discover page with podcasts from /api/podcasts - WORKING (6 episodes displayed), (3) Discover page trending from /api/discover/trending - WORKING, (4) Radio stations from /api/radio/stations - WORKING (10 stations for Nigeria), (5) Offline page filter tabs ALL/AUDIO/ARTICLES with counts - WORKING, (6) Save for Offline button on Dashboard - WORKING (CloudArrowDown icon), (7) /api/offline/save, /api/offline/articles, DELETE endpoints - WORKING, (8) Theme toggle light/dark - WORKING.

light_mode_colors.notes: CSS variables correctly set: --color-primary: 98 129 65 (Forest Green #628141), --color-bg: 255 255 255 (Pure White #FFFFFF), --color-surface: 239 243 237 (Soft Sage #EFF3ED)

discover_page_podcasts.notes: 6 podcast cards displayed from /api/podcasts endpoint. LATEST/POPULAR sort toggle working. Episodes include: Arctic Routes, Quantum Synthesis, Megacities, etc.

discover_page_trending.notes: /api/discover/trending returns topics with counts and trend indicators (up/stable)

discover_page_radio.notes: 6 country buttons (NG, GH, KE, ZA, EG, MA), 10 radio stations loaded for Nigeria. Radio play button present. Stations include RFI Haoussa, Nigerian Gospel Music Radio, Radio East, Metro FM Lagos

offline_page_filter_tabs.notes: Filter tabs display: ALL (count), AUDIO (count), ARTICLES (count). Counts update when articles are saved.

offline_page_empty_state.notes: Empty state shows 'NO CACHED DATA' with GO ONLINE and MANAGE STORAGE buttons when no content saved

save_for_offline_button.notes: CloudArrowDown button on featured card (data-testid='featured-offline-btn') and stream cards (data-testid='offline-btn-{id}') working. Shows SAVED_OFFLINE toast notification.

offline_api_save.notes: POST /api/offline/save correctly saves articles with story_id, title, summary, narrative, source, category, image_url, saved_at

offline_api_retrieve.notes: GET /api/offline/articles returns saved articles sorted by saved_at descending

offline_api_delete.notes: DELETE /api/offline/articles/{story_id} removes specific article. DELETE /api/offline/articles clears all.

theme_toggle.notes: Toggle switches between light (data-theme='light') and dark (data-theme='dark'). Button shows 'LIGHT' in light mode, 'DARK' in dark mode.
